title: Shadow
lyrics:
Muneul datgo bureul kkeodo
Sarajijiga anha
Nae dwireul ttara geotneun neoui gieok
Eodume du nuneul garigo
Momseoril chyeobwado wae neoya wae

Meorissogeul jiugo taewodo

Ne eolgulman deo doesarana



Saranghaessdeon moseubi tteoolla

Nareul ttarawa maeil goerophineun neo

You’re like a shadow

Nae gwisgareul maemdolgo

Maemdoldeon ne moksoriga

Nareul tteonaji anha

Domangchyeodo naneun yeojeonhi dasi jejari

Oh you’re like a shadow



Sone jwil su eopsneun gieok

Deoneun uimiga eopseo

Nun tteumyeon baramcheoreom sarajil neo

Galsurok gireojin geurimja

Dwidoraseo bwado wae neoya wae



Ne moseubeul jiugo taewodo

Geu heunjeokman deo jiteojyeo ga



Saranghaessdeon moseubi tteoolla

Nareul ttarawa maeil goerophineun neo

You’re like a shadow

Nae gwisgareul maemdolgo

Maemdoldeon ne moksoriga

Nareul tteonaji anha

Domangchyeodo naneun yeojeonhi dasi jejari

Oh you’re like a shadow



Jogaknan gieokman

Yeongwonhi hamkkehal geoya

Nae mam deo gipi bakhyeowa

Nal jiul su eopseo

Dasi tteuneun bit teum saero nal jjireuneun

Your Shadow



Majimak ne moseubi tteoolla

Nareul ttarawa jakku biusneun deushae

You’re like a shadow

Eodum soge sumgo tto sumeodo

Dasi jjochawa

Nareul tteonaji anha

Domangchyeodo naneun yeojeonhi dasi jejari

Oh you’re like a shadow
